creator: MerrBear
body: I just noticed that this post cracked 200 favorites. Most on the site I'm pretty sure.

creator: meanpaul
body:
[quote]MerrBear said:
This is one of the only times I've seen an animator do "reverse dissolving." It seems like it would be really hard to key, but Yutapon makes it look easy
[/quote]

I assume he just animates it like if the creature dissolves, then he reverses the frames. Maybe he didn't do that, but it seems like the easiest way to pull it off.
